activities.title: Web Development Seminar - TechThinkers Coding Club
activities.description: Conducted an engaging seminar on modern web development technologies and best practices for fellow students. Shared insights on full-stack development, current industry trends, and practical coding techniques to empower the next generation of developers.

activities.title: Hackathon Organizer - TechThinkers Coding Club
activities.description: Organized a successful college-level hackathon with 30+ participating teams and over 150 students as Co-Lead of TechThinkers Coding Club. Managed event logistics, mentor coordination, and created an engaging competitive environment for student developers.

activities.title: AI Discussion at Nagpur Municipal Corporation
activities.description: Participated in a strategic discussion on Artificial Intelligence applications and innovations at the Nagpur Municipal Corporation (NMC) office. Contributed insights on AI integration in civic services and smart city initiatives.
